item.title: Why Your 'Realistic' Goals Are Killing Your Growth
item.description: The most dangerous goal is the one that feels “realistic.” It anchors your strategy to what you already have instead of what you could build. And it quietly caps your growth before you even start. I call this the Anchored Imagination problem—and it’s one of three momentum killers I …
